resources.string: The cat is a small carnivorous mammal belonging to the Felidae family. They are one of the most popular pets in the world, known for their playful and affectionate nature. Cats have a sleek and muscular body, with sharp retractable claws, and a long tail that helps them maintain balance. They have excellent eyesight, sharp hearing, and a highly developed sense of smell.

The dog is a domesticated mammal and a popular pet that belongs to the Canidae family. Dogs come in a wide range of breeds, each with their own unique physical characteristics and temperament. They vary in size from small breeds like Chihuahuas to large breeds like Great Danes.

The mouse is a small mammal belonging to the rodent family. They are found in various parts of the world, including both urban and rural areas. Mice have a small, round body with pointed snouts, large ears, and long tails that help them maintain balance.
